trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> A woman with startling blue hair is in search of her son who has disappeared without a trace.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_TODO_00<tab>Search for the azure-haired boy.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_TODO_01<tab>Search the designated location and follow the azure-haired boy.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_TODO_02<tab>Follow the azure-haired boy and defeat any enemies that threaten him.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_TODO_03<tab>Rescue the azure-haired boy.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_TODO_04<tab>Report to the azure-haired woman.

TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRMOTHER04232_000_000<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((ma'am)) ((sir)) /var>? Have you seen a little boy with hair a similar shade to mine? He's my son, and I can't find him anywhere!

TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRMOTHER04232_000_001<tab>It all started when I told him we ought to seek refuge in your encampment, and he started wailing and sobbing like I'd never seen. The next thing I knew, he was running hell-for-leather goodness knows where.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRMOTHER04232_000_002<tab>I'm worried he may have left the station altogether, and the streets above are rife with danger! Please, could you find him for me?

TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRMOTHER04232_000_003<tab>Oh you will? Bless your heart! If I know my son, he's probably tried to return to our house to the north of Palatium Novum. Try there first before anywhere. He'll be easy to recognize I should think, what with the color of his hair and all.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRMOTHER04232_000_005<tab>I will try searching the station again just in case, though I'd bet anything he's gone back to our house near Palatium Novum.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_007<tab>Another blocked street...?
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_008<tab>Wh-Who are you?
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_009<tab>Mother sent you? Hmph! Tell her I won't go to the enemy's camp─ I'm going home!
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_SYSTEM04232_000_011<tab>The boy with the sky blue hair has made good his escape. You had best resume your search for this obstreperous youth.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_012<tab>Stop following me!

TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_SYSTEM04232_000_013<tab>Once again, the boy with the sky blue hair has taken flight, and will likely be looking over his shoulder for signs of trouble from now on. With a weary sigh, you resume the hunt.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_SYSTEM04232_100_013<tab>Follow the boy from a safe distance. The objective will end in failure if you are noticed, or if you fall too far behind.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_SYSTEM04232_200_013<tab>Should you fail to complete the objective, you may try again by looking out over this location.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_SYSTEM04232_Q1_000_001<tab>Attempt to follow the azure-haired boy?
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_014<tab>No... Our home, it was here─right here!
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_015<tab>You again? Leave me alone! I'm staying here to build a new house─bigger and better than the old one!

TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_SYSTEM04232_000_016<tab>The child has escaped your grasp yet again. Though this may be construed as a particularly tiresome endeavor, remember that he is only a child and knows no better. You should find him before he comes to harm.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_020<tab>Why do you care so much?
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_021<tab>We're enemies, remember? Why are you trying to help me?
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_A1_000_001<tab>You need help, and I'm offering it.
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_A1_000_002<tab>How would your mother feel if something were to happen to you?
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_022<tab><sniffle> I don't care what you say! We don't need your help!
TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRBOY04232_000_023<tab>But Mother's worried. I should go back. To the station.

TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRMOTHER04232_000_025<tab>I was wondering when I would see you again. I'm happy to report my son has returned. Poor creature... You should have seen him─tears pouring down his little cheeks, crying his apologies to me. I know that you were the one who found him, though he didn't mention a word of it to me.

TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRMOTHER04232_000_026<tab>I almost couldn't believe my ears when he said he wouldn't mind moving to your camp. He was dead against it only hours ago. What could have happened, I wonder?

TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRMOTHER04232_000_027<tab>What? He was attacked? By that horrid magitek, you say? Goodness, that must have been quite a shock for my little man. Thank you for coming to his rescue.

TEXT_AKTKZD008_04232_BLUEHAIRMOTHER04232_000_028<tab>There is a salutary lesson to be gained from all this, though, one that I hope he retains. Do not scorn a proffered hand when one is in need, whether that hand be friend or foe's. At any rate, I thank you for finding him. It's not much, but please, I insist.
